column1: * 1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien is working on The Grey Bridge at Tavrobel while in Brooklands Officers Hospital
* 1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien goes on holiday to recuperate (see Letter 33).
* 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien met Clyde S. Kilby
* 1977 - Cliffs Notes on Tolkiens The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit is published.
* 2009 - The Lord of the Films is published.
* 2011 - A Critical Companion to J.R.R. Tolkien is published.

column2: a childrens book from Holiday House

column1: * 2016 - Songs of Sorrow and Hope is published.
